entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:51 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 06:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
